## EasyCallControlFactory.supportsEasyCallControl() method

Verifies whether a device supports easy call control or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
supportsEasyCallControl(potentialDevice: IDevice): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  potentialDevice | [IDevice](./jabra-js.idevice.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`true` if the device has a connection that has support for any call control functionality, `false` otherwise.
